function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Enmeshment of smart city technologies with Covid-19 management strategies in Global South cities","Impact":"Increased reliance on technology may lead to surveillance, privacy concerns, and unequal access to resources","Mitigation":"Ensure equitable access to technology, address privacy concerns, and develop alternative non-technological solutions","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveillance systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Residents of Global South cities, especially those in low-income areas","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Fantasies of biological and technological fix in pandemic crisis management","Impact":"Overreliance on technological solutions may overlook social and economic factors, leading to ineffective response","Mitigation":"Integrate social and economic considerations into pandemic management, prioritize community engagement and support","Technologies":"Biotechnologies, digital health solutions, medical devices","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Tensions between different modes of existence of smart city technologies in pandemic management","Impact":"Conflicting approaches may lead to fragmented response, hinder collaboration, and waste resources","Mitigation":"Facilitate dialogue and coordination between different technological approaches, prioritize interoperability and data-sharing","Technologies":"IoT devices, urban sensing technologies, data integration platforms","People":"Tech developers, urban planners, public health authorities","Owner":"Local governments, tech developers"}]}
